About the pkgdown document

pkgdown builds website using R package documentation (the .RD files).

The documentation build is here (not yet active until we merge this branch with master)

<<<<<<< HEAD

Or local at: bllFlow/docs/index.html

develop If you would like to contribute to and build the pkgdown document.

# Install release version from CRAN
install.packages("pkgdown")

# Install development version from GitHub
devtools::install_github("r-lib/pkgdown")

Run pkgdown from the package directory each time you release your package: <<<<<<< HEAD

=======
  ```
>>>>>>> develop
pkgdown::build_site()

For more information about pkgdown

Developed by Yulric Sequeira, Doug Manuel, Meltem Tuna.

Site built with pkgdown 1.2.0.
